title: Dories
creator_credit: Mike Mahoney, Ted Haley, Rex Tasker and Whitman Trecartin
brief_description: Captain Albert Crouse, narrator of the film, used dories for fishing off the coast of Lunenberg, Nova Scotia. The film sketches the history of the dory. A local craftsman gives a step-by-step demonstration of the vessel’s construction
creator_credit_for_label: Mike Mahoney, Ted Haley, Rex Tasker and Whitman Trecartin
